statements: SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT activity_type, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT id, timestamp, user_id FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS activity_count FROM suspicious_activities GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'hacking' AND user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 2 AND activity_type LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, activity_type, timestamp FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type IN ('phishing', 'scam') ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, activity_type, timestamp FROM suspicious_activities WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, activity_description, timestamp FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 3 AND activity_type = 'virus' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'login';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, status FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT id, activity_type, user_id, timestamp, description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, user_id, timestamp, transaction_type, status FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, activity_type, user_id, timestamp, description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, user_id, timestamp, transaction_type, status FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY user_id, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, activity_type, user_id, timestamp, description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY activity_type, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousActivities;
SELECT activity_type, description FROM SuspiciousActivities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM Transactions WHERE amount >= 100 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM Transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE last_login >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, timestamp FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT activity_type, description, timestamp FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE activity_type LIKE '%Hacking%';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Refund' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-05-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, agent_status FROM monitoring_agents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT log_date, log_time FROM security_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraudulent';
SELECT activity_id, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_date, log_time, log_message FROM security_logs WHERE log_id > 100 ORDER BY log_date ASC, log_time ASC;
SELECT agent_name, agent_status FROM monitoring_agents WHERE agent_location LIKE '%USA%'
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM Transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description, activity_date FROM SuspiciousActivities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT suspect_name, suspect_description FROM Suspects WHERE investigation_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin' OR role = 'Manager';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM Transactions WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT suspect_id, suspect_name, investigation_status FROM Suspects WHERE investigation_status = 'Under Investigation';
SELECT alert_id, alert_message, alert_date, alert_level FROM Alerts ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
